spells.name: Fire Bolt
spells.description:
You hurl a mote of fire at a creature or object within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 1d10 fire damage. A flammable object hit by this spell ignites if it isn't being worn or carried.

This spell's damage increases by 1d10 when you reach 5th level (2d10), 11th level (3d10), and 17th level (4d10).

spells.name: Magic Missile
spells.description:
You create three glowing darts of magical force. Each dart hits a creature of your choice that you can see within range. A dart deals 1d4 + 1 force damage to its target. The darts all strike simultaneously, and you can direct them to hit one creature or several.

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the spell creates one more dart for each slot level above 1st.

spells.name: Fireball
spells.description:
A bright streak flashes from your pointing finger to a point you choose within range and then blossoms with a low roar into an explosion of flame. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Dexterity saving throw. A target takes 8d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

The fire spreads around corners. It ignites flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried.

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 3rd.

actions.name: Aid
actions.trigger: An ally is about to use an action that requires a skill check or attack roll
actions.description: On your turn, use an action to prepare. Then, use your reaction to improve an ally's roll. Critical Fails can make the check worse.

actions.name: Crawl
actions.requirements: You are prone and your speed is at least 10 feet.
actions.description: You move 5 feet by crawling and continue to stay prone

actions.name: Delay
actions.description: Before acting, you can choose to delay your turn until after the turn of any other creature, altering the initiative order. Useful to make sure your turn happens when most effective.

actions.name: Escape
actions.description: Choose one effect that is grabbing, immobilizing, or restraining you and make an unarmed strike, or Athletics/Acrobatics check, against the effect's DC. Critical Failures prevent you from trying to Escape again until next turn.

actions.name: Interact
actions.description: Grab unattended objects or interact with objects around you. You can also grab stored objects.

actions.name: Leap
actions.description: Make a short jump that can cross a 5ft or 10ft gap if you have 15ft or 30ft of speed. Otherwise, you can leap vertically 3 feet higher. Longer jumps require using Athletics.

actions.name: Ready
actions.description: Forego actions this turn to prepare a SINGLE action to be used once a declared "trigger" occurs. Your Reaction is used to release your readied action.

actions.name: Release
actions.description: Drop something that you're holding. This does not trigger reactions like Attack of Opportunity

actions.name: Seek
actions.description: You attempt to detect creatures or objects. Some creatures that you detect may not be precisely located, depending on their visibility or the senses you used. Critical Successes can allow you to locate anything that you found while seeking.

actions.name: Sense Motive
actions.description: You try to tell if a creature is being honest. Your Perception vs the creature's Deception DC is secretly rolled by the DM. Critical Failures may present you false intuition, but you believe it to be true.

actions.name: Step
actions.requirements: Your Speed is at least 10 feet.
actions.description: Carefully scoot 5 feet without triggering reactions such as Attacks of Opportunity. You can only Step using land speed, and you cannot Step into difficult terrain.

actions.name: Strike
actions.description: Make an attack roll with the weapon you are using. If you meet or beat the target's AC, you succeed. On a Critical Success, this critical hit does double the damage you rolled for the strike.

actions.name: Take Cover
actions.requirements: You are benefiting from cover, could take cover, or are prone.
actions.description: Focus on taking advantage of your cover, improving its protection. This increases you effective AC, Reflex saves (against some effects), Stealth checks to hide/sneak. This lasts until you move, attack or become unconsious.
